data.text:
Share your views through our survey, and help us review EU legislation and ensure better levels of health protection: https://t.co/wPpOEg5pF3
#EUHaveYourSay https://t.co/7lKYn3O5ng

Protecting EU companies doing legitimate business in Iran and mitigating the impact of the re-imposed US-Iran sanctions.
The EU's updated Blocking Statute enters into force tomorrow, 7 August → https://t.co/IhuUJVYVCG #IranDeal #JCPOA

We have increased support for Spain with an additional €4.2 million to fight terrorism and organised crime. 🇪🇺🇪🇸
This will go towards equipment and technology to protect public spaces and fight online crime.
#SecurityUnion https://t.co/idngRuVvE3

We are backing a €600 million EU-China co-investment fund with the #JunckerPlan.
The fund will finance European and Chinese mid-sized companies, in areas such as healthcare, high-end industries, consumer goods and business services → https://t.co/ENyzYB1Y5W #investEU https://t.co/SmhnbBL1yu

data.text:
Record assistance for wildfires in Sweden shows EU solidarity 🇪🇺
Assistance mobilised through the European Civil Protection Mechanism:
• 360+ firefighters
• 7 planes
• 6 helicopters
• 67 vehicles
• 815 flying hours
https://t.co/S3U9ag7iOL #EUCivPro https://t.co/H73pC3FIkP

data.text:
In 1951, Robert Schuman saw Europe in big, when he initiated the European Coal and Steel Community.  
A precursurer to the EU today, it was the first time ever that six countries united to create a common market for coal and steel. #Archives30 #EUarchives https://t.co/rAoeckYxwD

The European Fund for Strategic Investments has reached its original objective of triggering €315 billion of financing. SMEs are the biggest beneficiaries and Greece is the country that received more funding per € of GDP → https://t.co/T7hKFvSsaj #investEU #EFSI https://t.co/RKK14BHlSG

Globally about 2.45 million people, of which 1.2 million children, are trafficked every year.
Find out what the EU is doing to #EndHumanTrafficking → https://t.co/gb9qEtY9MQ https://t.co/J0vtAcP7cA

Dealing with invoices should be simple for all businesses. Is that the case or is there something which should be improved?
Share your views: https://t.co/pLk22R6TL2 #EUHaveYourSay https://t.co/Li01tDIYwk

We report on efforts to tackle unfair trade.
How do we use anti-dumping and anti-subsidy measures in 2017 to ensure a level-playing field for European companies? 
Learn more here → https://t.co/JRNKYEBqrV  #EUtrade #EUprotects https://t.co/z2qPPNtKBv

annotations.normalized_text: EU-financed Oceanic Platform of the Canary Islands

data.text: Designed to drive forward advances in the maritime sector, the EU-financed Oceanic Platform of the Canary Islands offers researchers the opportunity to work on new energy solutions, pioneering new ways to fish and face climate change → https://t.co/r5UmMgUWgL #investEU https://t.co/RdOzr3NhLA

When it comes to our future on this planet, we know we need to take urgent action. By reusing and recycling the things we use, our aim is to gradually shift towards a green, sustainable and circular society Learn more → https://t.co/9jTJMAPeju #EUandMe #PlasticsStrategy https://t.co/u0P2YrkEHW

#ReadyToChange your relationship with plastics too?
Learn how to resist the seductive powers of the cup with #SingleUsePlastic lid (aka "the serial kisser") – and dump it before it dumps you!
https://t.co/v9bxIt6eTo #PlasticsStrategy https://t.co/j0uP4h4y0Q

data.text:
We are half-way through the completion of our participation to the #Archive30 challenge!
We found some amazing gems from our #EUarchives, have a look at our Twitter moment here → https://t.co/qrbK2At4rp https://t.co/7T8eqmrupL

Today we travel to a time before emails even existed! 
This is a 1983 letter received from an Indian official thanking the then President Gaston Thorn for his hospitality.
Maybe the most memorable trip of his life, but certainly the most amazing back cover! #EUarchives #Archive30 https://t.co/psJsxA1y2O

data.text:
The #JunckerPlan has made a clear impact on the EU economy.
It has mobilised €335 billion in additional investment across the EU since July 2015.
Discover the stories behind EU investment in our #investEU Twitter moment → https://t.co/EwPyHBsyIA https://t.co/bnIisoDmLt

We are standing by Europe's farmers this summer, as they grapple with the difficulties of extreme droughts. Farmers will be able to:
🌱 receive their direct and rural development payments in advance
🌱 get more flexibility to use land
Learn more → https://t.co/qO1sVWGgbG https://t.co/ahpVoP7XLv
This week we published reports from the first rounds of trade negotiations with Australia and New Zealand, as well as EU text proposals → https://t.co/nDbVbKNkvE #EUtrade https://t.co/ud4iL5F7Di

data.text: Going on holiday to Italy this summer? Don’t forget to visit Pompeii! With the help of EU funds, the site has been restored and expanded. Several buildings are now accessible to people with disabilities and better protected against the weather → https://t.co/3O0Fv0fuzT #investEU https://t.co/lY57Vnguio

A new way of working with national Parliaments, regional and local authorities is necessary.
The Task Force on Subsidiarity, Proportionality and Doing Less More Efficiently is proposing a shift in the way the Union legislates. #EfficientEU https://t.co/OZNKImn98S

Is your project turning the Sustainable Development Goals into concrete solutions? Apply today to win the #EUSustainabilityAward!
Find out more: https://t.co/P3zL0eNe4c https://t.co/98f02q7qic
🌈 No matter who you love, everyone should enjoy the same rights and be protected from discrimination in the same way. #EUandME #EU4LGBTI https://t.co/pwWNymS5ys

This time it's not enough to just hope for a better future
This time we all need to take responsibility for it.
This time, I’m voting → https://t.co/KWZvPLeMUV #EUelections2019 https://t.co/Vj7AQ0ZP4M

Did you know that we have a special font for our publications?
It is called “EC Square Sans Pro" and was designed to provide greater legibility.
We made sure that all alphabets are covered, including Greek and Cyrillic or the letters ą,  å, æ, ø, ę, ł or ń!
#Archive30 #EUarchives https://t.co/uEwL81Aqhg

Lost or stolen passports make up over 60% of the cases of #ConsularProtection.
If this happens, EU citizens are entitled to temporary emergency documents. More → https://t.co/PhC1kAl9D5 #EUandME
https://t.co/dKoyEe0X8E

@HCompier Hi Henk, this is part of an assessment of the EU summertime directive, to evaluate whether or not the rules should be changed. The aim is to guarantee coherence in the internal market and avoid chaos in different sectors such as transport and logistics. #EUHaveYourSay

@eclavieu Hi, thanks for your interest. Check out more of archive videos here: 
• https://t.co/wvAxFJvBRi
• https://t.co/yckLciSWzZ 
 and don’t miss out on the #Archive30 challenge! #EUarchives Best, the Social Media Team

It's day 13 of #Archive30 challenge and today we showcased the "Journey to work".  Of course it all looks much different today but everything is nice when it's black and white! https://t.co/qrbK2At4rp

We stand with Spain and support the efforts of the Spanish Government to develop an effective response to the increased number of arrivals in past months and to protect the EU's external border.
https://t.co/L83rQEWyti #MigrationEU https://t.co/TR30kVxpux
We have awarded an additional €3 million in emergency assistance to support Spain in responding to the recent migratory challenges → https://t.co/INOXYVaFjN #MigrationEU https://t.co/GVwbucUaqx
Bringing the past, present and future together - for day 12 of the #Archive30, our archivist describes what a "typical day" looks like for her!  https://t.co/cSHucvy244

urls.description: The InvestEU Programme builds on the successful model of the Investment Plan for Europe, the Juncker Plan which mobilised more than €500 billion in the period 2015-20. With the aim of triggering a new wave – more than €372 billion - in investments using an EU budget guarantee, the InvestEU Programme aims to give an additional boost to investment, innovation and job creation in Europe over the period 2021-27. InvestEU helps our economy recover from the coronavirus crisis. It contributes to transforming
urls.title: InvestEU | InvestEU

data.text: @sclabbers @anticorruption We want to inform citizens about the impact that EU investments have on real projects and real people. The company is mentioned as an example, to show real-life results. More information on #investEU → https://t.co/tvUj0ZOn24

Let's journey back to 1969! 
Follow us all the way to our headquarters in Brussels with the typical look and feel of the late ‘60s. #Archive30 #Euarchives https://t.co/k9FewD3CCU

Don’t fall for 🍭 lollipops with a single-use plastic stick and wrapping. Sugar can pop up in other forms. Like in long-term relationships with smarter alternatives.
It’s time to beat plastic pollution together! https://t.co/NIiJxdHIhx 
#BeatPlasticPollution #PlasticsStrategy https://t.co/qq2G0m2tMv

data.text: @Alainmachado7 @kickstarter Something like the European Investment Project Portal? Projects looking for funding can register here and have access network of international investors → https://t.co/4mgmBDyvCI

@Volonteurope @WelcomingEurope If you or anyone you know is interested in exploring more ideas for European citizens' initiatives, take a look at some of the ideas presented by EU citizens here ➡ https://t.co/OmOfY2trS2 #EUTakeTheInitiative

@JEF_Europe @Europarl_EN @ThunderclapIt @brandobenifei @TerryReintke @tomvdkendelaere @EPInstitutional @Youth_Forum @youthintergroup .@JEF_Europe, it’s important to debate the revision of the European Citizens’ Initiative re how it works and requirements from initiative supporters and organisers.
Post your opinion on how to improve the tool on the Forum: https://t.co/CKLwCAwMR0 #EUTakeTheInitiative
To all cyclists out there! Did you know that Swedish company Hövding has created an airbag for cyclists? EU-funding helped make it possible → https://t.co/c9ls3s9ts6 #investEU https://t.co/FXkxi4PIdZ

@EUCitizen2017 Hi @EUCitizen2017, here's a video explaining European Citizens' Initiative in less than 90 seconds ⏲️
Use the European Citizens' Initiative Forum to connect with citizens and  seek support for your initiative ➡ https://t.co/OmOfY2trS2  #EUTakeTheInitiative https://t.co/BZjx2W04Wq

@97_bossi Hi Riccardo, thank you for sharing your opinion! Shaping the EU requires everyone's participation. Post your ideas for new initiatives or discussed existing ones on the Forum ➡ https://t.co/OmOfY2trS2  #EUTakeTheInitiative

@EUwatchers .@EUwatchers, thank you for sharing the good news about #CivicParticipation!
Take a look at new ideas for initiatives on the European Citizens' Initiative Forum ➡ https://t.co/OmOfY2trS2 #EUTakeTheInitiative

As South and Southeast Asia are faced with the yearly monsoon season, we are mobilising €6 million to support disaster preparedness initiatives in the region, such as building up response systems against earthquakes and tsunamis → https://t.co/cRug0F8VJI #EUintheWorld https://t.co/WWsqN4E4vk

One of this year's #FieldsMedal awardees is Italian Alessio Figalli, whose ground-breaking work in mathematics is supported by @ERC_Research His works on the optimal transport theory study the ideal allocation of resources in everyday transport issues → https://t.co/Om2TK1ZnTR https://t.co/f2zAcp5MPE

We are standing by Europe's farmers this summer, as they grapple with the difficulties of extreme droughts. Farmers will be able to:
🌱 receive their direct and rural development payments in advance
🌱 get more flexibility to use land
Learn more → https://t.co/qO1sVWGgbG https://t.co/XDYhcmNuiV

European blue was the obvious choice for the entry "Favourite colour" in the #Archive30 challenge!
https://t.co/Z2orbe9azU

How many consular protection cases are lost or stolen passports?

As an EU citizen, you are entitled to seek #ConsularProtection from another EU country, when you are unrepresented outside the EU: https://t.co/PhC1kAl9D5 #EUandME

It's #ThrowbackThursday!
In 1988, we celebrated creativity with the European year of cinema and television, chaired by Simone Veil. This was exactly 30 years ago.
 In 2018, we continue this effort of a #EuropeforCulture with the European Year of Cultural Heritage.
 #EUarchives https://t.co/DvMmglVop6

Today is Roma Holocaust Memorial Day. 
On 2 August 1944, over 3000 Roma men, women, and children were murdered in the gas chambers of Auschwitz-Birkenau. 
We honour the memory of Roma victims of the Holocaust.
Read @TimmermansEU & @VeraJourova statement →
https://t.co/GXw7ysTrw9 https://t.co/OdGeVKKmex

Ever wonder what an archivist does all day? 
One of our archivists gives you a lowdown on the job!
Read her story → https://t.co/nDnQ0V3LM8 #Archive30 #EUarchives https://t.co/lPFY66b5vi
https://t.co/MeBnmfs7Gm
https://t.co/qwrm66kMkZ
https://t.co/7717AtepOv

The #FieldsMedals award outstanding mathematicians.
We are delighted to learn that our @ERC_Research grant holder Alessio Figalli is one of this year's Fields Medals awardees, for his work on Partial Differential Equations and the Calculus of Variations → https://t.co/8VRRIHtkfD https://t.co/AU70KP4Yi2
https://t.co/cEypSxKz27

From deploying cybersecurity solutions to building a wind farm or investing in infrastructure in the Nordic countries: dynamic Swedish entrepreneurs are being supported by the Investment Plan for Europe, which helps getting their projects off the ground #InvestEU https://t.co/QX3R7tQije

EU countries have made considerable efforts to protect marine environment.
However, more efforts are needed to ensure that the sea's resources are sustainably managed.
Read our new report → https://t.co/m33D8E70CI https://t.co/vMN7ja1WZj

Meet the finalists of this year’s #iCapitalAwards for the most innovative European cities of 2018! 
These administrations are delivering inspiring solutions to global challenges and working hand in hand with citizens.
https://t.co/aDvDO4Xk7n #HorizonEU https://t.co/nzEgcDNhxg

We support improving reception conditions in Greece with extra €37.5 million in emergency assistance.
This will go towards provisional services offered to migrants, like healthcare, interpretation, food, and more → https://t.co/6je4z1p3tW #MigrationEU https://t.co/lMnOL9X4lP

The Netherlands is joining the European Public Prosecutor's Office (EPPO)
This body will fight crimes against the EU budget such as fraud, corruption, money laundering or serious cross-border VAT fraud. 
It will be operational by end of 2020 → https://t.co/255by3R2sv
#EUProtects https://t.co/DvqwBoCXeQ

EU imports of soybeans from the U.S increased by 283%, bringing the EU's total share of imports of U.S. soybeans to 37%, up from 9% one year ago.
This is a win-win situation for European and American citizens.
Learn more → https://t.co/GrduDTQW6Z #EUtrade https://t.co/oem6ZEBiRd

twice a year for summertime 🌞 → https://t.co/ZZG5dhIQn5 #EUHaveYourSay 🤔💡

Daylight Saving Time: should we keep changing the
clock twice a year for summertime?

Should we keep changing the clock twice a year for summertime? 🤔⌚️🌞👍👎

👉 https://t.co/cVdkw7P8NJ #EUHaveYourSay

The European Citizens' Initiative aims to make the EU more democratic, transparent and citizen-friendly 🙋 
Our proposal to revise the #ECI will make it easier for citizens to use the tool. Learn more from this opinion article 👉 https://t.co/EMg5SmM0NS #EUTakeTheInitiative https://t.co/VT19NrToLM

Our favourite colour? Blue obviously!
A blue background with a circle of 12 stars that stand for the ideals of unity, solidarity and harmony among the peoples of Europe. 
The flag is a symbol of both the EU and the unity of Europe → https://t.co/2NJzzfM33P #Archive30 #EUarchives https://t.co/c60DkTDntA

The #EUelections2019 will be held on 23-26 May 2019.
This time we are not just asking you to vote, we are also asking you to help to persuade others to vote too.
Because when everybody votes, everybody wins. 
This time, I’m voting → https://t.co/KWZvPLeMUV https://t.co/yogSOIp37G

Day 10 of our participation to the #Archive30 challenge! 
For the entry "Archive building", we highlighted the role of @HistArchivesEU in preserving our #EUarchives https://t.co/U9JHNZTkV6

We are taking stock of our #BetterRegulation approach to make our policies:
💡 more transparent
💡 more efficient
💡 closer to your needs
Let us know what you think through the survey: https://t.co/sn01yXbGWV  
#EUHaveYourSay https://t.co/zd5KNO87jy

We are taking stock of our #BetterRegulation approach to make our policies:
💡 more transparent
💡 more efficient
💡 closer to your needs
Let us know what you think through the survey: https://t.co/sn01yXbGWV  
#EUHaveYourSay https://t.co/uqzjApgSnI

When it comes to the entry "Animal" in the #Archive30 challenge, the selection was not obvious. But we remembered that the 'sneezing panda' was among your favourite clip on EUtube! https://t.co/0wyUPmNbEs

We are supporting SMEs in Spain and Greece.
The @EIB signed two financing agreements worth €700 million in total. 
The transactions will be supported by the European Fund for Strategic Investments, under the #JunckerPlan → https://t.co/1tD6U1LKvm #InvestEU https://t.co/KTowYlRTvk

How do we use our anti-dumping and anti-subsidy measures to ensure a level-playing field for European companies?
Today, we publish our report on trade defence activities → https://t.co/JRNKYEBqrV #EUtrade #EUprotects https://t.co/6yHJ5NO3cO

The EU28 unemployment rate was 6.9% in June 2018, the lowest rate recorded since May 2008.
Did you know that the #JunckerPlan has already supported 750,000 jobs? 
This number is expected to rise to 1.4 million by 2020 → https://t.co/T7hKFvSsaj #EFSI #InvestEU https://t.co/UfpaLISM2F

The euro area unemployment rate was 8.3% in June 2018, down from 9.0% in June 2017. This remains the lowest rate recorded in the euro area since December 2008. 
Learn more → https://t.co/MgoQkthrgU @EU_Eurostat https://t.co/oGax09VFTJ

Did you know that our #EUarchives are stored in Florence? 
In the Villa Salviati located on the Florentine hills. It also serves as a research centre dedicated to the archival preservation and study of EU integration. 
Get to know them → https://t.co/OSzZ2b6gPx #Archive30 https://t.co/BLuP19HWA9

What do three German projects on traditional watchmaking, satellite systems manufacturing and innovative tumour treatment have in common?
→ They were all made possible thanks to the support of EU funding
#EFSI #InvestEU @EIB https://t.co/dLAu04XvII

Day 8 of the #Archive30 challenge was to present a "Drawing". 
We found that this drawing and original verses were a perfect match! https://t.co/NMqcYzco9F

🕒 Keep changing the time -or- time for a change?
Share your views on whether or not we should change the clock twice a year for summertime → https://t.co/ZZG5dhIQn5 #EUHaveYourSay https://t.co/Pf4dBC4BIO
We dug into our #EUarchives to find some good old black and white pictures for the entry "sum up your job"! #Archive30 https://t.co/hhfUUfL5xz

Trafficking in human beings is often linked with other forms of organised crime such as document fraud, drug trafficking, cybercrime, child pornography, migrant smuggling, benefit fraud.

Find out what the EU is doing to #EndHumanTrafficking → https://t.co/gb9qEtY9MQ https://t.co/blrLldlG9i
Reports from the first rounds of trade negotiations with Australia and New Zealand and EU text proposals are available online → https://t.co/VLsFKMXi6Z #EUtrade https://t.co/3yq0TqpB6F

Happy #InternationalFriendshipDay! 💙
You arrived as strangers, but you left as friends, sometimes as soulmates…
Have you had such an experience during your #Erasmus exchange?
Learn more about your rights as an EU citizen → https://t.co/j54YYLUMUg
#EUandME #FriendshipDay https://t.co/x6I08aY2y0

The work of the EU amounts to a form of the "peace congresses" to which Alfred Nobel refers as criteria for the Peace Prize in his 1895 will. The @NobelPrize certificate was the ideal item for the entry "Diary/letter" of our #Archive30 challenge! https://t.co/dJy2dm34Fa

The sneezing panda has a message for you! 
This little furball joined our 2009 campaign to raise awareness on how to use antibiotics in a responsible way. 
We promise: no animals were harmed during the filming of this sequence! #Archive30 #EUarchives https://t.co/rxqmM6kIVF

Are you visiting Hungary this summer? In the city of Szolnok, south of Budapest, an interactive aviation museum is revitalising its neighbourhood with the help the EU. Find out more: https://t.co/S9NwDgfhFH
#investEU https://t.co/hI8LRCOqrO

We want to hear from you!
Which measures are relevant to help long-term unemployed people find a job? Let us know in our survey, available in 24 languages → https://t.co/vAWzk0KDaH #EUHaveYourSay https://t.co/1IBaKbxszQ

Meet Ula-la. She's a sniffer dog of Polish customs and her daily job is to detect illegal drugs. 
More on the EU's #CustomsUnion → https://t.co/YnmaX6YGGF #50CU https://t.co/YDG7rUYZ4d

We want to hear what works and what doesn't in the way EU laws affect your daily life.
You can share your experience and help us with ideas to make laws fit for purpose, and to bring their benefits at a minimum cost.
Lighten the Load → https://t.co/ZccepZofWq #EUHaveYourSay https://t.co/s1z58GNPvs

What benefits will #Galileo bring to Europeans?
10% of the EU's GDP is dependent on space-related services.
From transport to energy and agriculture, read our thread about #EUspace ↓ 
https://t.co/388PgcFGbb

data.text:
Success!
Four more #Galileo satellites were successfully launched this week.
The service will be continuously available all over the world and even more precise!
Missed the launch? Watch it in replay, including the great explanations provided by @esa ↓
 https://t.co/mpCkf7tfVb

We leave our data basically at every step we take, especially in the digital world. The new #DataProtection rules put Europeans back in control of their data.
More: https://t.co/h0rqJaZ1B1 #GDPR https://t.co/WTmTd0sO18

Festivals, exhibitions, performances this summer: the European Year of Cultural Heritage offers a wide variety of events taking place across Europe
Find one near you → https://t.co/axebRaXjc3 #EuropeForCulture https://t.co/RzfKtdD3qL

We found this rather unusual verse in our 1970s staff newsletter...
Edith Piaf's song "Milord" inspired one of our colleagues to welcome more countries to the table, at that time occupied by only 6 guests! #Archive30 #EUarchives https://t.co/CeAISry9Ja
